name: Mothman Adventure
description:
Help Mothman save the people in the forest and pursue his passions!

This game has 3 levels and 2 endings! Can you get them both? 

The game also plays nicely with your mobile browser!

Controls: 

Enter - Start

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Interact

You can play in the browser or download the ROM and play in a Gameboy emulator.

PS Gameboy music is hard, sorry if it's grating.
